summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and shorelines, amending Sections 23.60.090, 23.60.246, 23.60.306, 23.60.365, 23.60.368, 23.60.430, 23.60.544, 23.60.606, 23.60.664, 23.60.666, 23.60.728 and 23.60.848; adding Sections 23.60.248, 23.60.308, 23.60.370, 23.60.436, 23.60.490, 23.60.550, 23.60.612, 23.60.734, 23.60.800, and 23.60.854; and repealing Section 23.60.366 of the Seattle Shoreline Master Program, Chapter 23.60 of the Seattle Municipal (Land Use) Code.
